directions: Combine half-and-half, cream of chicken soup, chicken breast meat, sour cream, hot pepper sauce, carrots, celery, and potatoes in a slow cooler. Cover and cook on Low for 6 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally. After 5 hours, stir in the blue cheese.
ingredients: 3 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
1 cup hot pepper sauce, or to taste
title: Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Wing Soup
